# react-select2-wrapper

Wrapper for [Select2](https://select2.github.io/)

## Installation

```
npm install react-select2-wrapper --save
```

## Documentation

- [Guide](/guide)

## Development

### Installation

1. Install dependencies
   ```
   npm install
   ```

2. Run the development server with hot reload
   ```
   npm run start
   ```
